Sentencas: The present work aims to predict the degradation in the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode owing to cation interdiffusion between the electrolyte and cathode and surface segregation.
Titulo: Heuristic Approach to Predict the Performance Degradation of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode

Sentencas: Cation migration in the (La(0.6)0Sr(0.40))(0.95)Co0.20Fe0.80O3-x (LSCF)-Gd0.10Ce0.90O1.95 (GDC) composite cathode is evaluated in relation to time up to 1000 h using scanning transmission electron microscopy (STEM)-energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDXS).
Titulo: Heuristic Approach to Predict the Performance Degradation of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode

Sentencas: The resulting insulating phase formed within the GDC interlayer is quantified by means of the volume fraction using a two-dimensional (2D) image analysis technique.
Titulo: Heuristic Approach to Predict the Performance Degradation of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode

Sentencas: For the very first time, the amount of the insulating phase in the GDC interlayer is quantified, and the corresponding performance degradation of the LSCF cathode is predicted.
Titulo: Heuristic Approach to Predict the Performance Degradation of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode

Sentencas: Mathematical relationships are established for the estimation of degradation due to surface segregation of the cathode.
Titulo: Heuristic Approach to Predict the Performance Degradation of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode

Sentencas: The ohmic resistance between the cathode and the GDC interlayer/electrolyte interface and the polarization resistance of the cathode, characterized by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS), show an excellent match with the predicted results.
Titulo: Heuristic Approach to Predict the Performance Degradation of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode

Sentencas: The combined degradation analysis and modeling for the cathode lifetime prediction provide a systematic understanding of the time-dependent cation migration and segregation behavior.
Titulo: Heuristic Approach to Predict the Performance Degradation of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathode
